name: Fantastic Dungeons
description:
A fantasy themed, mobile-friendly roguelike.

This game was created by for the 2016 Seven Day Roguelike Challenge, with the aid of rot.js library and lots of code reuse from my last year's 7DRL, Beware the Space Bears. Graphics and sounds were made by a multitude of talented people, gathered from OpenGameArt.org

Some inspiration was taken from these two excellent games: Pixel Dungeon and Hoplite. You should totally try them also!
